original_query: "Who won the Super Bowl last year?"

perception.result_requirement: The winner of the Super Bowl from the previous year.
perception.reasoning: The query is straightforward and requires looking up the winner of the Super Bowl from the previous year. This information is not readily available in my current knowledge, so a tool is needed to find the answer.
perception.local_reasoning: The query requires external search or a knowledge base lookup. I need to use a tool to retrieve the information.

plan_text: Step 0: Use DuckDuckGo to search for the winner of the Super Bowl last year.
Step 1: Extract the winner from the search results.
Step 2: Provide the extracted information as the answer.

steps.description: Search DuckDuckGo for the winner of the Super Bowl last year.

tool_arguments.code:
result = duckduckgo_search_results("Who won the Super Bowl last year?", 3)
return result

Buffalo Bills (4) - XXV , XXVI , XXVII , and XXVIII ; in 1964 and 1965 , theywonthelasttwo AFL Championships before the firstSuperBowlin ...

   URL: https://www.usatoday.com/story/sports/nfl/super-bowl/2025/02/05/super-bowl-winner-last-year-chiefs-49ers/77749677007/

perception.result_requirement: Determine the winner of the Super Bowl last year.
perception.reasoning: The search results clearly indicate that the Kansas City Chiefs won the Super Bowl last year. This directly answers the user's query.
perception.local_reasoning: The search successfully found relevant information about the Super Bowl winner from the previous year.
perception.solution_summary: The Kansas City Chiefs won the Super Bowl last year, defeating the San Francisco 49ers.
